TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed PrintAction extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the type of print operation occurring.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintAction> is used by the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs> type to indicate what type of <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print%2A> event is occurring.
> [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs.PrintAction%2A?displayProperty=fullName> does not reliably indicate the type of print operation occurring, and returns PrintToFile in all cases.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Printing.PrintAction PrintToFile = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The print operation is printing to a file.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Printing.PrintAction PrintToPreview = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The print operation is a print preview.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Printing.PrintAction PrintToPrinter = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The print operation is printing to a printer.
